name: Hex Tunnel
description: Enter another dimension and master the elements to become a supreme being. With arcade, chaos and ultra modes in procedural stages ensures a unique experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
